kpi.name: M1034C8

kpi_info.title: MAX SF256 CODE OCCUPANCY PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The maximum amount of Rel99 DL spreading codes allocated during the measurement interval for the reported Operator-ID. The amount of codes is represented in SF256 level so that for example one SF128 code contributes to the counter by value 2, and one SF64 code by value 4. UPDATED: The code utilization is sampled with 1-second intervals.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAX SF256 CODE OCCUPANCY PER OPER
